tags.name: subscriptions
tags.description: Service API for handling order subscriptions.

tags.name: support
tags.description: Service API for handling support operations with orders.

post.description: Creates a new order with an automatically generated ID

parameters.name: nep-organization
parameters.description: Used to access data for a specific tenant. This is also used to specify the login organization for a user in a tenant. If not provided, the user's parent organization is used.

parameters.name: nep-enterprise-unit
parameters.description: Allows a consumer to specify that the request should be processed within the context of a specific enterprise unit.

parameters.name: nep-service-version
parameters.description: Identifies the application version to route the incoming request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The media type of the entity-body, this endpoint only allows application/json as body

parameters.name: nep-source-organization
parameters.description: Indicates the order's source organization disregarding user's organization

400.description: Bad Request: The request is invalid

401.description: Unauthorized: The request requires user authentication

403.description: Access denied due to insufficient privileges

applied.description: Indicates whether an order has a loyalty ID applied to it or not.

level.description: Identifies how the adjustment is applied to the order

application.description: Name of the application used to initiate the check in event

location.description: CheckIn location from where order can be picked up

id.description: A specific number of the origin type to help identify it
A specific number of the vector type to help identify it

type.example: printer, queue, terminal, display or kiosk

messageAttributePatterns.description: The message attribute patterns to use when selecting messages published on a topic. If patterns are specified, the subscription will receive only those messages that are published with attributes that match the subscription's patterns. Each attribute pattern specified must be matched against the message's attribute values for the message to be delivered to the subscriber. Each message attribute pattern value must be a valid regular expression pattern

payloadDelivered.description: Indicates if payload should be delivered

name.description: Near by or cross street name for address

CrossStreetData.description: List of streets that intersect this address

email.description: Email address, for identification and contact purposes

id.description: The customer identifier, referencing the NCR platform customer data

name.description: The customer name is used for groups, organizations or usernames.If specifying an individuals name, use the first and last name fields.

phone.description: Phone number, for identification and contact purposes

typeLabel.description: If the 'Other' type is used, then provide a label specifying the type

ExpirationData.description: Date of expiration of the payment method like Credit card or Gift card or Debit Card

groupMemberId.description: ID of the group member to which this order line item belongs

override.description: Indicates this fee amount should be used instead of a calculated fee

provider.description: The service provider charging the fee

typeLabel.description: If the 'Other' type is used, then provide a label specifying the type

FeeData.description: Fees charged to this order, such as delivery or setup fees

fromCreatedDate.description: Search orders starting at this date

referenceIdName.description: Name of the field to search on

referenceIdValue.description: Value of the field to search for

toCreatedDate.description: Search orders ending at this date

pageContent.description: List of orders that matches the find criteria, limited by pageSize.

FindOrdersResult.description: The result of a find operation on the orders resource.

FulfillmentAddressBusinessData.description: Additional business data if this is a business address.

crossStreets.description: List of streets that intersect this address

notes.description: Delivery notes for the address (e.g. Use entrance on east side).

state.description: State or province of the address.

typeLabel.description: If type is 'Other', optionally specify the address type.

FulfillmentAddressData.description: Address information used in fulfillment (e.g. a delivery address)

autoClose.description: Indicates if the order is fulfilled as an open check

autoRelease.description: Indicates if the order should be auto released for fulfillment

catering.description: Indicates if the order is fulfilled by catering

fulfillmentTime.description: Indicates the time at which an order should be fulfilled

leadTimes.description: Fulfillment lead time expected for the order, such as delivery time or preparation time

notes.description: Notes added to aid in fulfillment (e.g. customer delivery instructions)

pickupDate.description: The date when the customer is due to collect the order

pickupLocation.description: The store where the customer will collect his order

tableId.description: The id of the table where the open check is coming from.

type.description: The type of fulfillment needed for this order

typeLabel.description: If 'Other' is the declared type, use typeLabel to specify the actual type

FulfillmentData.description: Information needed to fulfill the order delivery

interval.description: The measure for the lead time.

intervalUnits.description: The unit of measure for the lead time

type.description: The type of the lead time.

typeLabel.description: If the 'Other' type is used, then provide a label specifying the lead time.

FulfillmentLeadTimeData.description: Fulfillment lead time expected for the order, such as delivery time or preparation time

latitude.description: Represents the latitude degrees of the geographic coordinates

longitude.description: Represents the longitude degrees of the geographic coordinates

additionalProperties.description: Set of group member IDs for externals systems.

externalIds.description: Set of group member IDs for externals systems.

fiscalId.description: Fiscal identification of the group member

name.description: The group name for groups, organizations or usernames

GroupMemberData.description: List of group members for group ordering on line items

referenceId.description: The price change reference, like a promotion id

LinePriceModifierData.description: The price modifiers for this line only

isIncluded.description: Indicate if the tax is included in the item price

percentage.description: Tax percentage for presentation purposes. May be null

LineTaxData.description: The taxes for this line only

lockedBy.description: The unique Id/Name of the touchpoint that locked the customer order

lockedDate.description: The Date/Time when the locked happened, in ISO 8601 format

column.description: The column to sort the results by

direction.description: The direction to sort the results

OrderCriteriaSort.description: The sort order for the paged find response

additionalProperties.description: Map of additional Reference ID strings for the order

additionalReferenceIds.description: Map of additional Reference ID strings for the order

bagCount.description: Number of bags in the order

channel.description: Channel through which the Order was placed

channelLabel.description: If 'Other' is the declared type, use channelLabel to specify the actual type

currency.description: The currency of all money values in the order. This is the currency code as defined in ISO 4217

dateClosed.description: The date and time when order was closed.

dateFulfilled.description: The date and time when order status was changed to FINISHED.

dateInTransit.description: The date and time when order status was changed to IN_TRANSIT.

expireAt.description: The expiration date of the order. If the provided date is in the past, the expiration date will be set to 12 hours in the future.

fees.description: Fees charged to this order, such as delivery or setup fees

groupMembers.description: List of group members for group ordering on line items

owner.description: Responsible party for this order, where party can be application, site, person

payments.description: Payments information assigned to the order

promotions.description: Promotions information assigned to the order

source.description: Retail origin of the order, such as an order aggregator or third party ordering system.

taxExempt.description: Indicates that this order should be taxexempt. The point of sale should verify the customer is qualified for the order to beexempted.

taxExemptId.description: Tax Exemption Identifier to verify tax exempt status of an order

taxes.description: The taxes calculated for the order

totalModifiers.description: Modifiers on the orders' lines total

addressState.description: State or province of the address.

customerEmail.description: The Email of the the Customer associated with the order

customerFirstName.description: The First Name of the Customer associated with the order

customerFiscalId.description: The Fiscal ID of the Customer associated with the order

customerFullName.description: The Full Name of the Customer associated with the order

customerId.description: The Id of the Customer associated with the order

customerLastName.description: The Last Name of the Customer associated with the order

enterpriseUnitId.description: The enterprise unit of the order

excludeLockedOrders.description: Boolean value to specify whether or not to exclude locked orders returned.

expiredByDate.description: Order has expired by this date or later

fromCreatedDate.description: Order was created on this date

fromPickupDate.description: Order was picked up on this date or later

fromUpdatedDate.description: Order was last updated on this date, or later

phoneNumber.description: The Phone of the Customer associated with the order

pickupLocationId.description: The location in which the order was picked

returnFullOrders.description: Boolean value to specify the content of the orders returned.

sourceOrganization.description: The source organization of the order

toCreatedDate.description: Order was created on this date, or ealier

toPickupDate.description: Order was picked up on this date or earlier

toUpdatedDate.description: Order was last updated on this date, or earlier

OrderFinderCriteria.description: Criteria details to search orders. Order will have to match ALL provided fields in order to be in the result.

comments.description: General comments for each line item of an order. Comments has been deprecated, in favor of using the typed notes feature.

extendedAmount.description: The Line extended amount. That is: Quantity X Unit price

fulfillmentResult.description: Indicates the fulfillment result of line item

groupMemberId.description: ID of the group member to which this order line item belongs

itemType.description: The order line item type. e.g. Fee, Tare, Fuel...

linkGroupCode.description: Hospitality linkGroupCode, such as codes for 'toppings', 'sides', or Retail 'substitution'

modifierCode.description: The modifier code associated with the item, typically as defined in the POS system, to indicate e.g. 'well done', 'extra ketchup'

notes.description: The notes applying to this line item, such as cooking instructions, or customer substitutions preferred

overridePrice.description: Set to true to indicate that the item's current price should override any other local prices

parentLineId.description: The line identifier for the parent item. Parents are used to set up linkage between items, and to build a hierarchy of items.

priceModifiers.description: The price modifiers for this line only

scanData.description: Applicable for POS where picker writes composite barcode instead of overwriting product ID field. Maximum allowable length is 2710 characters.

supplementalData.description: Use for capturing gift payment (track data), product serial number, IMEI. Maximum allowable length is 2710 characters.

taxes.description: The taxes for this line only

orderLineIds.description: List of Order Line Item IDs. Items must exist on the order

items.description: List of Order Line Item IDs. Items must exist on the order

OrderLineGroupData.description: Line item(s) to which the promotion is applied

typeLabel.description: If the 'Other' type is used, then provide a label specifying the type.

OrderLineNoteData.description: The notes applying to this line item, such as cooking instructions, or customer substitutions preferred

dateUpdated.description: The datetime this order update occurred

deviceId.description: The deviceId making the order update

id.description: A generated unique identifier for the order version object

updatingOrganization.description: The organization responsible for this version

user.description: The user that made the order update

pageNumber.description: The page number of the response

sourceOrganization.description: The organization that originally created the order

totalResults.description: The total count of unacknowledged orders for the specified enterprise unit id

OrderVersionsResponse.description: Response containing all versions of the specified order

additionalProperties.description: Map of additional Reference ID strings for the order

additionalReferenceIds.description: Map of additional Reference ID strings for the order

bagCount.description: Number of bags in the order

channel.description: Channel through which the Order was placed

channelLabel.description: If 'Other' is the declared type, use channelLabel to specify the actual type

currency.description: The currency of all money values in the order. This is the currency code as defined in ISO 4217

dateAcknowledged.description: The date and time that an order was acknowledged as received by an NEP Enterprise Unit. If null, order has not been acknowledged by the target NEP Enterprise Unit.

dateClosed.description: The date and time when order was closed.

dateCreated.description: The date the order was created. A read only value that is handled internally, and will be disregarded if sent in a message

dateFulfilled.description: The date and time when order status was changed to FINISHED.

dateInTransit.description: The date and time when order status was changed to IN_TRANSIT.

dateUpdated.description: The last date the order was changed. A read only value that is handled internally, and will be disregarded if sent in a message

enterpriseUnitId.description: Site for which order is placed.

expireAt.description: The expiration date of the order. If the provided date is in the past, the expiration date will be set to 12 hours in the future.

fees.description: Fees charged to this order, such as delivery or setup fees

groupMembers.description: List of group members for group ordering on line items

id.description: Unique identifier. A read only description that is handled internally, and will be disregarded if sent in a message

owner.description: Responsible party for this order, where party can be application, site, person

payments.description: Payments information assigned to the order

promotions.description: Promotions information assigned to the order

source.description: Retail origin of the order, such as an order aggregator or third party ordering system.

sourceOrganization.description: Order's source organization name. A read only description that is handled internally

taxExempt.description: Indicates that this order should be taxexempt. The point of sale should verify the customer is qualified for the order to beexempted.

taxExemptId.description: Tax Exemption Identifier to verify tax exempt status of an order

taxes.description: The taxes calculated for the order

totalModifiers.description: Modifiers on the orders' lines total

OrderViewData.description: Represents information of the order that is used for viewing purposes.

accountNumber.description: An account number like house account or a customer number.

groupMemberId.description: ID of the group member to which this order line item belongs

maskedPAN.description: Masked Personal Account number. Only valid with payment types AccountsReceivable, CreditDebit.

payBalance.description: Indicates if remaining balance should be charged to the user

paymentTime.description: Timestamp when the most recent order payment was submitted

referenceId.description: External reference identifier, to relate the payment line to the payment system

status.description: The payment status. i.e. PreAuthorized, Authorized, Paid, PendingVerification

subType.description: The payment's subType. Here subType is required for CreditDebit card type. Return error if subType is not given for CreditDebit card type input.

enum: AccountsReceivable, AirmilesConversion, CapitalBond, Cash, Check, CheckCard, CoPay, Coupon, CustomerAccount, ElectronicTollCollection, FoodStamps, GiftCertificate, HouseAccount, InternationalMaestro, Loyalty, ManufacturerCoupon, PurchaseOrder, StaffDressAllowance, StoredValue, TravelersCheck, UKMaestro, Voucher, WICCheck, CreditDebit, Other

PaymentData.description: Payments information assigned to the order

hasArrived.description: Indicates if the pickup contact has arrived at the site

imageLink.description: Link to an image of the pickup contact

phone.description: Phone number for the pickup contact

type.description: The identifier type. i.e. UPC, SKU, EAN

ProductIdData.description: The identifier of the product used to create the order line

amount.description: Total amount discounted by the promotion

numGuests.description: The number of guests for which this promotion is applicable

orderLineGroups.description: Line item(s) to which the promotion is applied

referenceId.description: Customer identifier for a specific promotion

supportingData.description: Additional information required by some promotion types

PromotionData.description: Promotions information assigned to the order

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure. Returns exceptions when this unit of measure contains invalid code.
enum: EA, GLI, GLL, LTR, INH, FOT, MMT, CMQ, CMT, MTR, MTK, MTQ, GRM, KGM, LBR, ANN, CEL, FAH, OTHER

unitOfMeasureLabel.description: The unit of measure label. This field can be populated when unitOfMeasure  is selected/entered as other description.

value.description: The units description per unit-of-measure. Required field when unitOfMeasure is entered. Accepted decimal and positive/negative numerical value.

orders.description: List of unacknowledged orders for the specified enterprise unit id

pageNumber.description: The page number of the response

totalResults.description: The total count of unacknowledged orders for the specified enterprise unit id

ResyncResponse.description: Response containing all unacknowledged orders for the specified enterprise unit id

active.description: Determines if this tax is in effect

groupMemberId.description: ID of the group member to which this order line item belongs

isIncluded.description: Indicates if the tax is included in the item price. Note: the name is for backward compatibility with the v1.1 OrderService API

percentage.description: Tax percentage for presentation purposes. May be null

TaxData.description: The taxes calculated for the order

groupMemberId.description: ID of the group member to which this order line item belongs

referenceId.description: The price change reference, like a promotion id

TicketTotalModifierData.description: Modifiers on the orders' lines total

groupMemberId.description: ID of the group member to which this order line item belongs

VehicleData.description: Vehicle information of the pickup contact
